About Me

I am a passionate DevOps Engineer with extensive experience in automating, optimizing, and maintaining modern infrastructure. My expertise lies in implementing CI/CD pipelines, container orchestration, and cloud infrastructure management.

With a strong foundation in both development and operations, I specialize in bridging the gap between software development and IT operations to deliver efficient, scalable, and reliable solutions.
